title: The states-men and favourites of England since the reformation their prudence and policies, successes and miscarriages, advancements and falls; during the reigns of King Henry VIII. King Edward VI. Queen Mary. Queen Elizabeth King James. King Charles I.
author: Lloyd, David, 1635-1692.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by J.C. for Samuel Speed, at the Rainbow neer the Inner Temple-gate in Fleet-street,
